Oct. 16, 1937 D Wadhurst Contest (Section 2)
Wadhurst Contest (Section 2) 20 March & Hymn Contest Wadhurst Contest wadhurst-contest-section-2
None
Wadhurst, Sussex
Hymn tune contest - 1st Wadhurst, 2rd West Chiltington, 3rd Sevenoaks. 4 bands competed.
Jan. 17, 2014, 8:59 a.m. March 17, 2020, 2:41 p.m.
1 West Chiltington Silver Band C. M. Chatfield
2 Turners Hill and Worth John Chantler
3 Sevenoaks Town A. Dunkley
4 Wadhurst Brass Band Andrew Shaw
